function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate provisions for disabled parking spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient land-use in parking design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for peak period movements and vehicle turnover frequency may lead to congestion and increased risk of disease transmission in the parking area","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pedestrian safety measures at entrance and exit points may lead to increased risk of accidents and potential exposure to contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and illumination in the car parking building may contribute to poor air quality and lack of visibility, posing potential health hazards and increased risk of disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of secondary research approach from multiple countries increases the risk of introducing infectious disease-related guidelines or standards from high-risk areas.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Descriptive research involving on-site measurements and observations of a parking building increases the risk of exposure to infectious diseases for the researchers and personnel involved.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adaptation proposal for car parking buildings may overlook the integration of infectious disease control measures, increasing the risk of inadequate protection against disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and overcrowding in buildings can increase the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of social distancing measures in architectural design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Constant changes in the environment leading to the need for adaptive architecture","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of functional and technical solutions to achieve transformable design","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"}]}
